title: Number of Sears stores in the United States 2011 - 2017 , by type
summary: Overall Full-line stores is gradually decreasing, Specialty stores is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Number of stores, in descending order is: 1. Full-line stores, and lastly, 2. Specialty stores.
The minimum Number of stores about 25.0, occured at 2016 by Specialty stores.
The difference of Number of stores between Full-line stores and Specialty stores is smaller at Year 2016 compared to the Year 2012.
min_summary: Overall Full-line stores is gradually decreasing, Specialty stores is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
mid_summary: Overall Full-line stores is gradually decreasing, Specialty stores is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
max_summary: Overall Full-line stores is gradually decreasing, Specialty stores is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Specialty stores reported the lowest Number of stores about 25.0 in Year 2016
The greatest difference of Number of stores between Full-line stores and Specialty stores occurs at Year 2012 and the smallest difference occurs at 2016.
